intro.message: Urban infrastructure is often unsuitable for the needs of care workers. Identifying these vulnerabilities should increase the visibility of the problems and, at best, help planners better address these needs.

label.personInNeed: Who do you take care of?
label.personInNeedAge: Age of the Person in Need
label.sameHousehold: Is the person in need living in the same household?
label.additional: Do you have anything else important to tell us about yourself?

alert.submitPersonalDataError: Your personal data couldn't be saved. Please try again.
alert.submitMobilityDataError: The data couldn't be saved. Please try again.
alert.submitAudioError: The audio record couldn't be saved. Please try again.

closeMobilityDataDraw.title: Close Tool
closeMobilityDataDraw.description: Are you sure you want to close this tool? Entered data won't be saved.

submitPersonalData.title: Submit personal data
submitPersonalData.description: Are you sure you want to submit your personal data? The data can't be edited after submitting.

submitDrawnData.title: Submit mobility data
submitDrawnData.description: Are you sure you want to submit your mobility data? The data can't be edited after submitting.

deleteLocationFeature.title: Delete stop
deleteLocationFeature.description: Are you sure you want to delete this stop? This can't be undone.

deleteRouteFeature.title: Delete route
deleteRouteFeature.description: Are you sure you want to delete this route? This can't be undone.

deleteAnnotation.title: Delete annotation
deleteAnnotation.description: Are you sure you want to delete this annotation? This can't be undone.

deleteRecord.title: Delete record
deleteRecord.description: Are you sure you want to delete this record? This can't be undone.

deletePerson.title: Delete person
deletePerson.description: Are you sure you want to delete this person? This can't be undone.

employments.J: Federal voluntary service or voluntary social year
employments.L: Not gainfully employed (including: pupils or students who do not work for money, unemployed, early retirees, pensioners without additional income)

dailyRoutine.introduction: Draw a route on the map to start.
dailyRoutine.drawingHint: Click on the map to start drawing a route. Double click on the map to finish the route.
dailyRoutine.addLocationMarker: Click on the map to place the marker.

annotations.pointDrawingHint: click on the map to place an annotation point.
annotations.routeDrawingHint: Click on the map to start drawing a route. Double click on the map to finish the route.
annotations.areaDrawingHint: Click on the map to start drawing an area. Double click on the map to finish the area.
annotations.introduction: For further annotations, draw points, routes or areas on the map.

closing.title: Thank you for participating!
closing.message: You're welcome to enter more of your daily routines.
closing.finishMessage: Otherwise we would like to thank you for your time.

personalOrEnd.title: Thank you for entering your data!
personalOrEnd.personalDataChoice: Share some personal data with us.
personalOrEnd.choseNoPersonalData: Or click below to complete your input.

testMode.noDataSent: Since you are testing the application, the data is not stored.
